00060 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::getDefaultDocOptions()
00061 {
00062   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00063 
00064   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00065   SelfDoc::Opt Step = {"step", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "50", "50", "1", "NA", "Allele Peaks step size."};
00066   opts.push_back(Step);
00067 
00068   SelfDoc::Opt Window = {"window", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "250", "250", "30", "NA", "Allele Peaks window."};
00069   opts.push_back(Window);
00070 
00071   SelfDoc::Opt PointCount = {"point-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "128", "128", "30", "1024", "Allele Peaks number of points."};
00072   opts.push_back(PointCount);
00073 
00074   SelfDoc::Opt Bandwidth = {"bandwidth", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.45", "0.45", "0", "1", "Allele Peaks bandwidth."};
00075   opts.push_back(Bandwidth);
00076 
00077   SelfDoc::Opt Cutoff = {"cutoff", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.05", "0.05", "0", "0.5", "Allele Peaks cutoff."};
00078   opts.push_back(Cutoff);
00079 
00080   SelfDoc::Opt CleanThreshold = {"clean-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.25", "0.25", "0", "1.0", "Allele Peaks clean threshold."};
00081   opts.push_back(CleanThreshold);
00082 
00083   SelfDoc::Opt Symmetry = {"symmetry", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA", "Allele Peaks SCAR mirror flag."};
00084   opts.push_back(Symmetry);
00085 
00086   return opts;
00087 }

00090 /**
00091  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00092  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00093  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00094  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00095  *
00096  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00097  *
00098  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00099  */
00100 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00101 {
00102     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00103     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00104     CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks();
00105     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00106 
00107     pMethod->m_iStep = setupIntParameter("step", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00108     pMethod->m_iWindow = setupIntParameter("window", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00109     pMethod->m_iPointCount = setupIntParameter("point-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00110     pMethod->m_dBandwidth = setupDoubleParameter("bandwidth", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00111     pMethod->m_dCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00112     pMethod->m_dCleanThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("clean-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00113     pMethod->m_bSymmetry = setupBoolParameter("symmetry", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00114 
00115     return pMethod;
00116 }

00129 bool CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::loadSnpReferenceFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00130 {
00131     Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::loadSnpReferenceFile");
00132     bool bSuccessful = false;
00133 
00134     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName)) {
00135         try {
00136             affx::File5_File file5;
00137             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00138             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00139 
00140             if(!group5->name_exists("FLDCutoff3peaks") || !group5->name_exists("FLDCutoff4peaks")) {
00141                 return false;
00142             }
00143 
00144             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5;
00145 
00146             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDCutoff3peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00147             double dThreePeakFLD_X = 0.0;
00148             double dThreePeakFLD_Y = 0.0;
00149             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00150             {
00151                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dThreePeakFLD_X);  m_vThreePeakFLD_X.push_back(dThreePeakFLD_X);
00152                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &dThreePeakFLD_Y);  m_vThreePeakFLD_Y.push_back(dThreePeakFLD_Y);
00153             }
00154             tsv5->close();
00155             delete tsv5;
00156 
00157             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("FLDCutoff4peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00158             double dFourPeakFLD_X = 0.0;
00159             double dFourPeakFLD_Y = 0.0;
00160             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00161             {
00162                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dFourPeakFLD_X);  m_vFourPeakFLD_X.push_back(dFourPeakFLD_X);
00163                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &dFourPeakFLD_Y);  m_vFourPeakFLD_Y.push_back(dFourPeakFLD_Y);
00164             }
00165             tsv5->close();
00166             delete tsv5;
00167 
00168             if(!group5->name_exists("ShrinkFactor3peaks") || !group5->name_exists("ShrinkFactor4peaks")) {
00169                 return false;
00170             }
00171 
00172             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ShrinkFactor3peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00173             double dThreePeakShrink_X = 0.0;
00174             double dThreePeakShrink_Y = 0.0;
00175             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00176             {
00177                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dThreePeakShrink_X);  m_vThreePeakShrink_X.push_back(dThreePeakShrink_X);
00178                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &dThreePeakShrink_Y);  m_vThreePeakShrink_Y.push_back(dThreePeakShrink_Y);
00179             }
00180             tsv5->close();
00181             delete tsv5;
00182 
00183             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("ShrinkFactor4peaks", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00184             double dFourPeakShrink_X = 0.0;
00185             double dFourPeakShrink_Y = 0.0;
00186             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00187             {
00188                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dFourPeakShrink_X);  m_vFourPeakShrink_X.push_back(dFourPeakShrink_X);
00189                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &dFourPeakShrink_Y);  m_vFourPeakShrink_Y.push_back(dFourPeakShrink_Y);
00190             }
00191             tsv5->close();
00192             delete tsv5;
00193 
00194             group5->close();
00195             delete group5;
00196             file5.close();
00197             bSuccessful = true;
00198 
00199         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00200     }
00201     return bSuccessful;
00202 }

00204 
00205 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::filterCutOff( CNProbeSetArray* probeSets,
00206                                                 int chrStart,
00207                                                 int chrEnd,
00208                                                 float cutoff3,
00209                                                 float cutoff4,
00210                                                 vector<bool>& filteredProbeSets
00211                                                 )
00212 {
00213     // Filter based on the FLD cutoff functions
00214     for (int i = chrStart; i <= chrEnd; i++) {
00215       if (((probeSets->getAt(i)->getMaxPeaks() <= 3)  &&
00216            (probeSets->getAt(i)->getFLD() > cutoff3))  ||
00217           ((probeSets->getAt(i)->getMaxPeaks() >= 4)  &&
00218            (probeSets->getAt(i)->getFLD() > cutoff4)))
00219         {
00220             filteredProbeSets[i] = true;
00221         }
00222     }
00223 }
00224 
00225 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::computeSNPQC(CNExperiment& objExperiment, CNProbeSetArray& vProbeSets)
00226 {
00227     // Calculate SNPQC
00228     if (!m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {return;}
00229     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-use-contrast")) {return;}
00230     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-k")) {return;}
00231     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-em-threshold")) {return;}
00232     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-bin-size")) {return;}
00233     AffxArray<AffxString> arSNPIds;
00234     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-snp-list")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-qc-snp-list") != ""))
00235     {
00236       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00237       std::string snp;
00238       tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00239       if (tsv.openTable(m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-qc-snp-list")) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00240         while( tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
00241           tsv.get(0,0, snp);
00242           arSNPIds.add(new AffxString(snp) );
00243         }
00244         tsv.clear();
00245       }
00246     }
00247     arSNPIds.quickSort(0);
00248     std::vector<double> vData;
00249 
00250     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("snp-qc-use-contrast")) {
00251         if (arSNPIds.empty()) {
00252             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00253                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00254                 if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {
00255                     vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getIntensityContrast(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-k")));
00256                 }
00257             }
00258         } else {
00259             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00260                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00261                 if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {
00262                     AffxString str = pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName();
00263                     if (arSNPIds.binarySearch(str, 0) != -1) {
00264                         vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getIntensityContrast(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-k")));
00265                     }
00266                 }
00267             }
00268         }
00269     } else {
00270         if (arSNPIds.empty()) {
00271             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00272                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00273                 if (pobjProbeSet->getInformation() != 0.0 && pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {
00274                     vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getSCAR());
00275                 }
00276             }
00277         } else {
00278             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00279                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00280                 if (pobjProbeSet->getInformation() != 0.0 && pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {
00281                     AffxString str = pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName();
00282                     if (arSNPIds.binarySearch(str, 0) != -1) {
00283                         vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getSCAR());
00284                     }
00285                 }
00286             }
00287         }
00288     }
00289     arSNPIds.deleteAll();
00290     for (int i = 0; (i < vData.size()); i++)
00291     {
00292         if (vData[i] != vData[i])
00293         {
00294             vData[i] = 0;
00295         }
00296     }
00297     objExperiment.setSNPQC(HomHiLoCelListener::computeStatistic(vData, m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-em-threshold"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-bin-size")));
00298     objExperiment.setIsSNPQCset(true);
00299 
00300     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00301     Verbose::out(1, "CNQC  (MAPD) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getMadDiffCN()));
00302     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("snp-qc-use-contrast"))
00303     {
00304         Verbose::out(1, "SNPQC (Contrast) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getSNPQC()));
00305     }
00306     else
00307     {
00308         Verbose::out(1, "SNPQC (PVQC) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getSNPQC()));
00309     }
00310     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00311 }

00314 /**
00315  * @brief Run the analysis.
00316  */
00317 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::run()
00318 {
00319     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::run(...) start");
00320     isSetup();
00321 
00322     resetAllelePeakInitialValues();
00323     determineLocalProbeSets();
00324 
00325     if(!m_bSNPAlreadyLoaded) {
00326         ///@todo  Add error messaging if no snp-reference file is input. Also exit run gracefully.
00327         AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-input-file");
00328         loadSnpReferenceFile(strFileName);
00329         m_bSNPAlreadyLoaded = true;
00330     }
00331     // Compute SNPQC
00332     if (!getExperiment()->isSNPQCset()) {
00333         computeSNPQC(*getExperiment(), *getProbeSets());
00334     }
00335     int iStepSize = m_iStep;
00336     if (iStepSize > m_iWindow) {
00337         Verbose::warn(0, "Step size (" + ToStr(m_iStep) + ") exceeds window size (" + ToStr(m_iWindow) +
00338                       "). Using window size instead.");
00339         iStepSize = m_iWindow;
00340     }
00341     fillSnpChrBounds();
00342 
00343     shrinkToPeaks(getProbeSets());
00344 
00345     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::run(...) end");
00346 }

00352 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::fillSnpChrBounds()

00354     fillChrBoundsImpl(getProbeSets(), m_chrBounds);
00355 }

00358 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::determineLocalProbeSets()
00359 {
00360     if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00361     {
00362             return;
00363     }
00364     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00365     const bool isCyto2 = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2");
00366 
00367     int iNumberOfProbeSets=CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00368     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00369     {
00370         CNProbeSet* p = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex);
00371         if (isCyto2 && !p->getValidSCARExists())
00372         {
00373             continue;
00374         }
00375                 if (isCytoScanHD)
00376                 {
00377                         if(p->processAsVisualization())
00378                         {
00379                                 getProbeSets()->add(p);
00380                         }
00381                 }
00382                 else
00383                 {
00384                         if(p->processAsSNP())
00385                         {
00386                                 getProbeSets()->add(p);
00387                         }
00388                 }
00389     }
00390     m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=true;
00391 }
00392 
00393 
00394 CNProbeSetArray* CNAnalysisMethodAllelePeaks::getProbeSets()
00395 {
00396         return &m_vLocalProbeSets;
00397 }
